website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser GSP 370 wireless gaming headset delivers strong audio quality but a dearth of connection options and extra features.
cons: No wired or Bluetooth connection options
Sennheiser app only works on Windows 10

customer_reviews.title: Just too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace wired PC 350 SE headset (6 years of use) but despite loving the sound quality the headset is just too small. My ears feel stuffed into the earpieces and ear lobes squashed. They've got to go back.
customer_reviews.author: NPSL

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: First pair, the microphone broke. Second pair, tried to update the software and the dongle bricked. Awful. I had a pair half the price and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and it was faulty - had to speak to three different people No customer support It's not actually a Sennheiser The model has is being provided by a different company I have wasted 3 hours of my time to find out it doesn't work and the customer service is shocking I really wish i never bought this, don't do it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset.
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming headset. Software a bit basic but the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: lambo7

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: 100 hours of battery life means you dont need to charge as much. Usually headsets are like 20 hours only but this is 100. The comfort is excellent and the sound isolation is amazing. They are very noise cancelling imo. Sound quality is as usual with sennheiser always really good. Its lightweight as well. Mic quality howver could be better overall but still clear
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Wahjudi

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting these to be that good based on other reviews however at £130 i was willing to take a pun.. The firmware updated without issue, the range is a good 40ft and man do these sound amazing. Only issue i have now is i kinda want the 670's just because of how good these are. Buy them, even at full price they are amazing..
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is amazing and the sound quality is great. Way better than the Logitech G935's i had previously. I dont use the software though as that was buggy, but works perfectly without.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Got recommended this by a friend. Was really sceptical on buying it after seeing all the reviews about connectivity problems and bricking the headset. Despite that decided to buy it. Throughout the month of use didn't encounter any major problems, so really satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: excellent headset eventually
customer_reviews.text: An excellent headset that has a very long battery life, is very comfortable to wear for long periods of time, fabulous sound the trouble was that it took a long time to get the headset to work at all. My grandson eventually got it to work having found someone online who advised him to contact Sennheiser Gaming via Facebook Messenger. They sent him a link via email which fixed the issue enabling to customise sound and mic settings from the downloadable program. I awarded a 4 out of 5 stars because I believe this link should have been more accessible. It is a really good Headset and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: creamkate

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: These are almost perfect for me. They’re light to wear and the padding isn’t hot and bulky. The sound is clear and the mic works well, although neither are fully noise cancelling. The big downside is the Bluetooth is prone to disconnecting. The drop out can take place at any time – after 15 minutes or after 4 hours – it’s very frustrating. I’ve tested them on other machines and the same disconnect happens. It’s a real shame. Without the Bluetooth issue these are great. I’m not sure the battery life really is 100 hours, but I used mine for 44 hours and no battery charge was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey Lea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and comfortable! Low latency technology for wireless gaming experience, superior battery performance with 100 hours of battery life,advanced noise-canceling broadcast quality microphone and sound quality with exceptional bass performance and acoustic clarity. Highly recommend, especially as a birthday or Christmas gift! Great value for money, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Shark

customer_reviews.title: Wireless gaming head phones
customer_reviews.text: Superior sound quality with the bonus of being wireless so no tangled wires and you can move anywhere around the room and still hear game play very well made good quality and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: sy roberts

product_meta.title: Sennheiser GSP 370 Over-ear Wireless Gaming Headset, Low-Latency Bluetooth, Noise-Cancelling Mic, Flip-To-Mute, Audio Presets - PC, Mac, Windows, and PS4 Compatible - Black
product_meta.description: The GSP 370 wireless gaming headset delivers a powerful combination of advanced ergonomics, performance and freedom from cables. This closed acoustic gaming headset features a Low-latency connection developed by Sennheiser That ensures stable, uninterrupted transmission with near-zero delay. The convenient on ear volume dial puts audio control at your fingertips while a broadcast quality, noise-cancelling microphone guarantees crystal clear communication. The lift-to-mute feature means you can flip up your Mic when you need mute quickly. The Sennheiser Gaming suite (available for windows) allows you to customise numerous settings, including surround sound modes and equaliser pre-sets, for a truly personalised gaming experience. Designed for comfort during long gaming sessions; every element, from the memory foam ear pads to the split padded headband to the ball-joint hinge, has been carefully chosen to create a customised fit and feel. When you take your gaming seriously you take your audio seriously, get a GSP 370.
feature_bullets: Low-latency – The GSP 370 wireless gaming headphones deliver lossless Bluetooth connection and state-of-the-art low Latency technology to create a virtually Seamless sound experience
Flip-to-mute mic – A broadcast-quality, noise-cancelling microphone cuts out breathing and background noise with an additional flip-to-mute feature
Long-lasting power – play longer with up to 100 hours of Bluetooth usage on one charge
Customise your sound - Sennheiser gaming suite for customisation and optimisation of audio settings for this closed acoustic wireless gaming headset
Comfortable wear – split padded headband helps reduce pressure while a clever ball-joint hinge makes it easy to perfectly angle The ear cups to ensure your comfort during long gaming sessions

Immerse yourself - German-Engineered transducers ensure exceptional clarity while the closed-back acoustic design and memory foam ear pads provide excellent noise isolation to help you immerse yourself in the game
